本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course will be conducted mainly face-to-face, but some of the classes will be conducted online (simultaneous or on demand), depending on the coronavirus situation, and the pace of the course. Also, some on demand classes will be conducted as part of the COIL project.

General course format:
This is NOT a lecture class. Lessons are highly student-centered involving pair work, group work, and presentations. Students are expected to actively contribute to class discussions and respond to other students, including making comments and asking questions. They are also expected to complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

第4回: Week 4: Global Culture Project - Group Discussions or Presentations
